health crisis line responders usually don give their names and callers aren allowed request specific responders much healthier and safer for the callers develop relationship with the agency whole availability but mostly about wider perspective and preventing compassion fatigue helper gets over their head with someone whose mental health issues including suicidality which often comorbid with
